Actions.Title: Add URL to your favourite list
Actions.Prompt:
This URL will open together with all other URLs you provide in this setup. 
After setup you just need to type ;start anywhere in your system to open all URLs.

Note: In order to reset all of the saved URLs press âŒ˜ + , and in the "variables" tab find and delete "ddm_fav_urls" variable
